revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Huawei |model=EchoLife HG520 |revision=s |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=RTA7105W |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/21/2006 |fcc_id=H8NRTA7105W |pcb_id=3041-001460 |type=wireless router, dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=TrendChip |cpu1_model=TC3162P2 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2561 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=HG520s |default_ssid_regex=^HG520s$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:24:D2 |oui_eth=00:24:D2 }}
:[http://www.vodafone.co.nz/documents/pdf/modem-guides/vf-HG520s-bb-fullmanual.pdf Manual] ([[Vodafone]])
*"41-000420" appears to be silkscreened on the front of the board in the FCC photos. *"3041-001460" is silkscreened on the back of the board in the FCC photos. There is a sticker with a 00:11:F5 (Askey) OUI on the back of the board in the FCC photos.
*[http://bbs.thmz.com/thread-730399-1-1.html Pictures on thmz.com forums] ("3041-001470" is silkscreened on the board)
The FCC manual states the default IP is 192.168.1.1 and the username:password as Admin:Admin.
The default SSID appears to be HG520s. WiGLE shows support for this SSID with OUIs: :00:16:E3 (Askey, 84 entries), 00:1B:9E (Askey, 642 entries), 00:21:63 (Askey, 1300 entries), :00:24:D2 ([[Askey]], 2041 entries), and 00:18:02 ([[Alpha Networks]], 110 entries).
===See also=== :;[[Huawei]] • [[Vodafone]] *[[Huawei B310s-22]] - Vodafone (2016) 4G • *[[Huawei B593u-12]] - Vodafone (2015) 4G • [[Broadcom]] BCM5358U *[[Huawei HG253s v2]] (rev D) - Vodafone (2014) FTTH • [[Broadcom]] BCM6362 *[[Huawei HG556A]] - Vodafone (2011) ADSL • [[Ralink]] RT3062F/[[Atheros]] AR9223 *[[Huawei B970]] - Vodafone (2010) 3G • *[[Huawei B960]] - Vodafone (2009) 3G • *[[Huawei HG553]] - Vodafone (2009) ADSL • [[Broadcom]] BCM4318
